title: Farnesoid X Receptor (FXR) Aggravates Amyloid-beta-Triggered Apoptosis by Modulating the cAMP-Response Element-Binding Protein (CREB)/Brain-Derived Neurotrophic Factor (BDNF) Pathway In Vitro
